title: Microsoft Outlook Online Meetings Preferences
description: Preferences for Microsoft Outlook Online Meeting Functionality

DisableSkypeMeeting.title: Disable Skype for Business Online Meetings
DisableSkypeMeeting.description: (DisableSkypeMeeting)-Prevent users from adding Skype for Business online meeting details to events

DisableTeamsMeeting.title: Disable Teams Online Meetings
DisableTeamsMeeting.description: (DisableTeamsMeeting)-Prevent users from adding Teams online meeting details to events
